title: It's Not Too Late to Start Investing at 40: Here's Why
subtitle: Discover how starting to invest at 40 can lead to significant savings by retirement with compound interest. Learn about low-cost index funds and how investing just $300 monthly can create wealth.
content:
It's Not Too Late to Start Investing at 40: Here's Why

If you are 40 years old and you think it's too late to start investing, then you need to know this one thing right now. I'm Tyler, a former financial advisor and portfolio manager, and now I make financial content for free.

Start Your Investment Journey

If you were to invest $300 a month starting today into a low-cost index fund like Vanguard's VOO or Fidelity's FXAIX, you would most likely have just under $300,000 waiting for you at retirement.

The Power of Compound Interest

The fascinating part is that just under $200,000 of that money would be from compound interest alone. Just by putting that $300 a month into a low-cost index fund and investing it, you could have an additional $200,000 of created wealth waiting for you at retirement.

Your Choice

Or you could just keep telling yourself it's too late and invest $0 a month and have $0 waiting for you at retirement. Your call.
